content.full_text: Check of Abraham Lincoln to Self, 18 January 18561 Springfield Marine and Fire Insurance Co., Pay toSelfor Bearer, fifty three64/100Dollars In Current Bank Bills.2
paragraphs: Check of Abraham Lincoln to Self, 18 January 18561 Springfield Marine and Fire Insurance Co., Pay toSelfor Bearer, fifty three64/100Dollars In Current Bank Bills.2
citations: Harry E. Pratt,The Personal Finances of Abraham Lincoln(Springfield, IL: Abraham Lincoln Association, 1943), 166.

footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln filled in the blanks of this partially printed check and signed it.
